s: I have used many brands of Kelp and I wanted to say this one is the darkest green and has the strongest smell of any of them. Makes some others look like sawdust by comparison. This has very dark green granular powder that smells like the sea. I seems to be the best quality based on sight and smell. My plants are doing great- but it is likely my blend of "pixie dust" has that effect rather than one product. ... I got exactly what is in the photo of the Maxicrop ...
